name: brand-identity-design-system
description: Brand Identity Design System - Monorepo with React Frontend and Express Backend

scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix backend
scripts.clean: rm -rf client/node_modules backend/node_modules node_modules client/dist backend/dist
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run preview --prefix client" "npm start --prefix backend"
